parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the inference experiment to stop.

parameters.name: ModelVariantActions
parameters.description: Array of key-value pairs, with names of variants mapped to actions. The possible actions are the following: Promote - Promote the shadow variant to a production variant Remove - Delete the variant Retain - Keep the variant as it is (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: DesiredModelVariants
parameters.description: An array of ModelVariantConfig objects. There is one for each variant that you want to deploy after the inference experiment stops. Each ModelVariantConfig describes the infrastructure configuration for deploying the corresponding variant. (dict) --- Contains information about the deployment options of a model. The name of the Amazon SageMaker Model entity. The name of the variant. The configuration for the infrastructure that the model will be deployed to. The inference option to which to deploy your model. Possible values are the following: RealTime: Deploy to real-time inference. The infrastructure configuration for deploying the model to real-time inference. The instance type the model is deployed to. The number of instances of the type specified by InstanceType.

nested_params.name: ModelName
nested_params.description: The name of the Amazon SageMaker Model entity.

nested_params.name: InfrastructureConfig
nested_params.description: The configuration for the infrastructure that the model will be deployed to.

nested_params.name: InfrastructureType
nested_params.description: The inference option to which to deploy your model. Possible values are the following:

nested_params.name: RealTimeInferenceConfig
nested_params.description: The infrastructure configuration for deploying the model to real-time inference.

nested_params.name: InstanceType
nested_params.description: The instance type the model is deployed to.

nested_params.name: InstanceCount
nested_params.description: The number of instances of the type specified by InstanceType.

parameters.name: DesiredState
parameters.description: The desired state of the experiment after stopping. The possible states are the following: Completed: The experiment completed successfully Cancelled: The experiment was canceled.

nested_items.name: InferenceExperimentArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the stopped inference experiment.
